vulnerability_findings.name: Overflow bugs
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: userBalances[to] = userBalances[to] + amount; // Fixed integer overflow vulnerability

vulnerability_findings.name: Reentrancy bug
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (bool success, ) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)(""); // At this point, the caller's code is executed, and can call transfer()

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_cross_function (patch_7.sol#3-20) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (patch_7.sol#7-12)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_7.sol#14-19):
	-(success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() patch_7.sol#17

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
Callstack Depth Attack Vulnerability
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (bool success, ) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)(""); // At this point, the caller's code is executed, and can call transfer()
